I have the same problem as "cyrus23". Everytime I try to extract the file: flt-bio.020 it malfunctions, Sais it is corrupt. I have tried with three diffrent extrecting programs (one of them winRAR). Please help me I am eeger to start playing ;)

Having a Bitch of a time trying to extract...
had to rename all the files to bioflt(file#).rar so that i could extract them, now its saying it cannot extract because the volume bioflt(file#).rar.r00 is missing or something of that nature not entirely sure...some help would be great as I really like this game and Want to jump into it.
now its just telling me all my files are corrupt....
Ok got it installed but everytime i turn on the game, after copying the crack, the screen goes black for a moment and then crashes the game...this is getting to be alot more trouble than its worth...
I too have the problem that when i pickup money, the game crashes. What should i do to fix this problem? =P

i had the same problem for weeks (crash when i pick up money) just fixed it today. my problem was the .reg file was not installed properly (vista btw) i had to get regedit (download from net) write in the file path of the .reg file (should be secu.eg.reg) the install it to the registry as soon as i did that i played it fine for 3 hours (3 mins at a time befor) and picked up every items i could get my hands on :). if this works for anyone else plz write a comment on this page thx.
For a quick way to make your system fast to play games at their best click my name and download the torrent "Make Your Windows XP Clean And Fast"
